alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 2:25AM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Nassau, Coastal Duval and Western Putnam Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Western Putnam
